ExperienceSection.SubText: What I have done so far

Points.FirstPoint: Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies.
Points.SecondPoint: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products.
Points.ThirdPoint: Implementing responsive design and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Points.ForthPoint: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers.

ProjectsSection.ProjectsText: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.
